Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Model of a mortar and pestle
Description: Model of a mortar with pestle standing vertically inside. The object is tubular-shaped, without any foot or neck, and is slightly restricted in the upper section. The base is slightly convex. See E 27 026 and E 27 027.
